Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: In certain stages in Sonic Generations and the Unleashed Project, settings for Sonic's physics have overrides. Adjust this option according to whether you are playing the standard game or the Unleashed Project to remove redundant overrides, allowing Sonic to handle more consistently. Or, set it to 'N/A' if you are not playing either of those (for example, a different stage mod).

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Adjust Modern Sonic's physics settings and Homing Attack button.
Recommended for use with the Unleashed Project.
Recommended for use with the standard game. This setting also addresses a glitch that can occur in Crisis City Act 2.
Use this mod's Classic Sonic physics settings. Handling will be similar to standard Generations with some differences like Spinning lasting longer.
Use the standard game's complete physics settings or settings from another mod.
Use Unleashed physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button.
Use Unleashed physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button.

Use physics settings partially based on the Unleashed Preview Build with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button. Some differences include a higher jump, faster Wall Jump, and slower Light Speed Dash. Level design may not function as intended with these settings.

Use physics settings partially based on the Unleashed Preview Build with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button. Some differences include a higher jump, faster Wall Jump, and slower Light Speed Dash. Level design may not function as intended with these settings.
Use the standard game's complete physics settings or settings from another mod.
